link_desc:
This template is created to monitor a Microsoft Team Foundation Server that was installed using the Standalone install method.

Items

  • SQL Server Express Service
  • Visual Studio Team Foundation Background Job Agent
  • IIS Service Port 8080
  • IIS Service Port 443
  • IIS Admin Service
  • IIS World Wide Web Publishing Service

Triggers

  • HTTPS Connections Unavailable
  • IIS Admin Service Not Running
  • TFS Background Agent Service NOt Running
  • TFS Check-In Service Unavailable
  • WWW Service Not Running
